trans-unit.source: Provides a base class for filter controls.

The QueryableFilterUserControl class is the base class for user controls that render filters that can be plugged into the Dynamic Data filtering framework that is based on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryExtender> class.

Implementers must override the <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.QueryableFilterUserControl.GetQueryable%2A> control, which can return a modified <xref:System.Linq.IQueryable> object that reflects the filter's state.
The base class contains helper methods for building LINQ expression trees.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.DynamicData.QueryableFilterUserControl"></xref> class.
Gets the transformed <xref:System.Linq.IQueryable> object from the source <xref:System.Linq.IQueryable> object.
The source <xref:System.Linq.IQueryable> object.
The name of the property.
The value for the `propertyName` parameter.
The transformed <xref:System.Linq.IQueryable> object from the source <xref:System.Linq.IQueryable> object.
Gets the column to use for filtering.
The column to use for filtering.
Gets the default values that are mapped for the table.
By default, Dynamic Data provides Boolean, foreign-key, and enumeration filter templates.
The default values that are mapped for the table.
Gets the default values that are mapped for the table.
The default values that are mapped for the table.
Occurs when the <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.QueryableFilterUserControl.OnFilterChanged*> method is called.
To be added.
Gets the data control that handles the filter inside the filter template.
This property is `null` if the filter template does not override it.
The data control that handles the filter.
Gets the transformed <xref:System.Linq.IQueryable> object from the source <xref:System.Linq.IQueryable> object.
You must implement this method if you derive a control from <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.QueryableFilterUserControl>.
The source <xref:System.Linq.IQueryable> object.
The transformed <xref:System.Linq.IQueryable> object from the source <xref:System.Linq.IQueryable> object.
Raises the <xref href="System.Web.DynamicData.QueryableFilterUserControl.FilterChanged"></xref> event.
Call this method when the filter selection has changed in order to notify the data source that the query must be re-run.
Populates a list control with all the foreign-key elements or Boolean elements in the table.
Foreign-key columns are populated with elements from the foreign-key table.
Boolean columns are populated with "All", "True", and "False".
A list control.
